messages.subject: Looking for housesitters
messages.msgSnippet: I am sorry for the cross post to various lists....hope you don t get too annoyed with me. We are an unschooling family of 4 and will be going away for two
messages.messageBody:
I am sorry for the cross post to various lists....hope you don't get
too annoyed with me.

We are an unschooling family of 4 and will be going away for two trips.
We would *love* to have another unschooling or homeschooling family
come stay at our house. There would be no cost, but we ask that you
take care of our 3 dogs (Lab, smaller mutt, Shih Tzu) and our 3 cats
and one Ball python. You could use one of our cars if you didn't bring
your own.
We live on 5 acres in Benson, AZ, which is town of 5000, about 45
minutes form Tucson. Our house has 3 bedrooms (master, dd 9, ds 13),
DSL, XBox, Gamecube, NO television (other then many, many foreign
channels). We own some movies though and have two video stores in town
for rentals.

We are looking for these dates: Saturday, April 14 through Saturday,
April 28. And Wednesday, June 20 through Tuesday, July 10.
Arrival could be on earlier date, departure on later, but not the other
way around. Naturally we do not expect one family to come for both
dates...

If you are interested, please contact me at arbinsy@.... Feel free
to pass on this mail to any local lists you may be on. We do prefer a
home- or unschooling family, but if you know of someone else perfect,
that would be good too.

Thank you!
Sybelle
dh Arnold
dd Bibiana (9)
ds Ingo (13)
